mapper.select: select star_no as starNo, store_no as storeNo, storepay_no as storepayNo, store_product as storeProduct, member_id as memberId, star_date as starDate, star_score as starScore, star_content as starContent, store_reportcount as storeReportcount from store_star WHERE store_no=#{storeNo}

select * from (select star_no as starNo, store_no as storeNo, storepay_no as storepayNo, store_product as storeProduct, member_id as memberId, star_date as starDate, star_score as starScore, star_content as starContent, store_reportcount as storeReportcount from store_star order by star_no desc) WHERE storeno=#{storeNo}
